content: crochet these fun **candy cane amigurumi ornaments** for your christmas tree and holiday home décor note these are not intended as children s toys because there is a metallic wire inside **materials** 3 0-mm c usa 11 uk hook dk 3 medium weight yarn fiberfill or your favorite stuffing material 14 gauge aluminum wire for jewelry wire cutter tapestry needle **yarn suggestions** i used paintbox yarns cotton dk in the following colors a champagne white 403 b red wine 416 feel free to use any comparable yarn **size** 5″ 13 cm by 2 5″ 6 cm *this pattern is written in us terms* **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 2 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
